children.name: Get an overview of your Inspect-to-Quality (ITQ) Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Inspect-to-Quality (ITQ) process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1 - Discovery: A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 2 - Overview: Key KPIs and metrics that describe the current process state from a particular use case perspective.
Page 3 - Analysis: High-level analysis of key use cases and changes over time.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: User Guide - Process Conformance checker widget
children.description: Choose this widget to (a) display various activities (b) map the process against BPMN process model

blocks.text: The aim of Variant Explorer Widget is to discover the various process paths. You can display several variants at a time.
Before you start, make sure that a BPMN model is created via "Generate BPMN" (top right corner) or linked. Read more on how to link a BPMN process in section Create an investigation.
For further information, check Signavio Documentation here.

children.name: Number of Usage Decisions
children.description: Number of Create Usage Decision

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(event_name) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')

children.name: Number of Accepted Usage Decisions
children.description: Number of Usage Decisions which have been Accepted

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
    (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE ("UD Code" = 'A')
      	AND event_name ='Create Usage Decision'
     ) > 0
    )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Inspection Lot items
children.description: Number of Create Inspection Lot items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service'

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Average Cycle Time of the End-to-end process

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG (
	(SELECT LAST (END_TIME))
     -
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))
	)
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES 
	('Create Inspection Lot' 'Create Usage Decision' ILIKE 'Material Movement%')

children.name: Number of Process Variants
children.description: Total amount of Process Variants

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with changes like 'Change Usage Decision'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%'
            OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 10
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ITQ events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
      'Create Inspection Lot' -> 
      'Begin Result Recording' -> 
	  'Complete Result Recording' -> 
      'Create Usage Decision' ->
	  ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
        )
        / COUNT (CASE_ID) 
* 100
  FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Changed Usage Decisions
children.description: Number of Usage Decisions which have been Changed

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Change Usage Decision')

children.name: Number of Material Movement
children.description: Number of cases with Material Movement (either Free or Restricted)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (event_name) 
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'

children.name: Number of Rejected Usage Decisions
children.description: Number of Usage Decisions which have been Rejected

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
    (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE ("UD Code" = 'R')
      	AND event_name ='Create Usage Decision'
     ) > 0
    )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Material Movement Free
children.description: Number of Single Material Movements (Free)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (event_name) 
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement Free'

children.name: Number of Material Movement Restricted
children.description: Number of Single Material Movements (Restricted)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (event_name) 
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement Restricted'

children.name: Cases with Free and Restricted Material Movement
children.description: Number of Cases that have both event Material Movement Free and Restricted

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
  WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Free')
  AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Restricted')
) 
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: KPIs that describe the current Process state from a particular Use Case perspective.

children.name: Number of Inspection Lot items
children.description: Total Number of Inspection Lot items

children.name: Usage Decisions Accepted Rate
children.description: Percentage of Accepted Usage Decisions

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code" = 'A')) > 0
	  AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
    ) /
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM(
    (SELECT
        COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
          WHERE
          ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service'))))
  ) / 
  SUM(
    (SELECT
    	COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
    	  WHERE
		    ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))
  ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate Over Time
children.description: Automated events rate Over Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Month", 
  SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
                  WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))))) 
  / 
  SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))) * 100 AS "Automation rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Average Cycle Time End-to-end process

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG (
	(SELECT LAST (END_TIME))
     -
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME))
	)
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES 
	('Create Inspection Lot' 'Create Usage Decision' ILIKE 'Material Movement%')

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of ITQ events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
      'Create Inspection Lot' ->
      'Begin Result Recording' -> 
	  'Complete Result Recording' -> 
      'Create Usage Decision' ->
	  ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
  	 ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create Inspection Lot')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Inspection Lot items Over Time
children.description: Distribution overview of the amount of Inspection Lot items Over Time

children.name: Average Cycle Time Over Time
children.description: Average Cycle Time of the End-to-end process

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name IN ('Create Inspection Lot')))
	) AS "Inspection Lot Creation Date",
    
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
    ) AS "Average Cycle Time"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES 
	('Create Inspection Lot' 'Create Usage Decision' ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST

blocks.text: This page shows how the main KPIs are changing over time

children.name: Material Movement Free Rate Over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases with Material Movement Free over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month',
    (SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE event_name LIKE 'Material Movement%'
        )
        )) AS "Material Movement Creation Date"

  ,COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
      WHERE
        EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Free'))

  / COUNT (CASE_ID) *100 AS "Material Movement Free Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), 
NULL

children.name: Conformance Level Over Time
children.description: Percentage of cases following the pre-defined order of ITQ events

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
  ) AS "Event Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
  	'Create Inspection Lot' -> 
    'Begin Result Recording' -> 
    'Complete Result Recording' ->
	'Create Usage Decision'
     ~> ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
   	) 
   / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
  	  ) * 100 AS "Conformance  Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES (ILIKE 'Material Movement%')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
NULL

children.name: Usage Decisions Rejected Rate
children.description: Percentage of Rejected Usage Decisions

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code" = 'R')) > 0
	  AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
    ) /
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Free Material Movement Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with Material Movement Free

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement Free' 
    )
    /
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%' 
    )
*100
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Restricted Material Movement Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with Material Movement Restricted

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement Restricted' 
    )
    /
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%' 
    )
*100
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Usage Decision Over Time
children.description: Distribution overview of the different Usage Decisions Over Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE event_name IN ('Create Usage Decision')
)
    )) AS "Usage Decision Creation Date",
  	COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
          WHERE
          event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
		  AND (SELECT
          BOOL_OR("UD Code" = 'R' OR "UD Code" = 'A')
      )
     ) AS "Usage Decision",     
	"Usage Decision Text"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC FILL TIMESERIES('month')
